name: Pokemon Oliv Green
description:
Pokemon Oliv Green:

you play like all old Pokemon games i want to gave people a little throwback to their childhood.

there are lots of old pokemon but i made some new too .

Im still developing it so i will bring many updates with new routes,citys and pokemons.

If you like or love the old Pokemon games like me i think u will like my game too so if you want try out.

You are playing in the Buskuala region.

now here are living more Pokemons then in any other region but in the begining

the other regions laughed about buskuala.

Because we didnt had much Pokemon but over the years the trainers brought them to buskuala and after all that years almost every Pokemon lives here.

But in buskuala are Pokemons that no other region have and will never have it because they dont like it there the buskuala Pokemons are very very strong

but often they dont want to be find.
